topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A security researcher identified a vulnerability in the Telcel registration platform that allows for unlimited spam and SMS bombing by abusing the company's own infrastructure.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/39680205/status/2011110173209735582

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Current and former Target employees have confirmed that source code and documentation leaked by a threat actor are authentic. The company has since initiated an 'accelerated' lockdown of its internal Git systems.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/axsharma.com/post/3mccoemr4fk2l
- https://bsky.app/profile/bleepingcomputer.com/post/3mccmslomt42b

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The threat actor group 'ShinyCorporation' claimed to have breached the database of Dell Technologies, allegedly gaining unauthorized access to employee data including email addresses, IP addresses, and passwords.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/190389182/status/2011025711545668012
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mccptsglfk2c

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Digital investment advisor Betterment confirmed a data breach after hackers gained unauthorized access to systems and sent fraudulent crypto-related notifications and scam emails to customers.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28762622/Betterment-hacked-customer-data-breached-in-the-attack
- https://bsky.app/profile/bleepingcomputer.com/post/3mccyxr4g3b2p
- https://techcrunch.com/2026/01/12/fintech-firm-betterment-confirms-data-breach-after-hackers-send-fake-crypto-scam-notification-to-users/

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A Nexo user reported a stolen account incident that occurred on January 9th, where all funds were lost and security settings (2FA and whitelisting) were compromised despite the user having offline authentication enabled.
Sources:
- https://www.reddit.com/r/Nexo/comments/1qav46k/stolen_account

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The Ethereum-based project Truebit was exploited for approximately $26.4 million (8,535 ETH) due to a smart contract overflow bug in a 2021 contract. The vulnerability allowed an attacker to mint large quantities of TRU tokens at near-zero cost, resulting in a 99% price drop for the token.
Sources:
- https://cointelegraph.com/news/26m-truebit-hack-smart-contract-vulnerability
- https://web3isgoinggreat.com/single/truebit-exploit

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Flow announced plans to destroy counterfeit tokens that were created following a security breach.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28755514/Flow-Plans-Destruction-of-Counterfeit-Tokens-Following-Security-Breach
